mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_date, notice_hit FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, noticeno, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_date, notice_hit FROM( SELECT noticeno, notice_title, notice_contents, to_char(notice_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') notice_date, notice_hit FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endNo} ) WHERE RN >=#{startNo}
